Class MusicStructure

  • java.lang.Object
    • MusicStructure

  • public class MusicStructure
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that describes the structure of a song, composed of Sound objects

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSound(Sound sound)
      Appends a Sound to the end of the structure
      void clearSounds()
      Erases all the sounds of the music structure, leaving it empty implies exists() = false
      boolean exists()
      Checks if a structure exists or not (is empty, in this case)
      Sound getFirstSound()
      Returns the first sound of the music structure, without removing it
      Sound getLastSound()
      Returns the last sound of the music structure, without removing it
      java.util.LinkedList<Sound> getSounds()
      Converts MusicStructure to a linked list of Sound objects
      Sound popSound()
      Removes the first sound of the music structure, which is the return object of this method
      Sound[] toSoundArray()
      Converts MusicStructure to an array of Sound objects
      java.lang.String toString()
      Converts the music structure to a string that is reading-friendly

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • exists

        public boolean exists()
        Checks if a structure exists or not (is empty, in this case)
        Returns:
        true if there are one ore more sounds on the structure

      • addSound

        public void addSound(Sound sound)
        Appends a Sound to the end of the structure
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound to be added

      • toSoundArray

        public Sound[] toSoundArray()
        Converts MusicStructure to an array of Sound objects
        Returns:
        the array of sounds that compose the structure

      • getSounds

        public java.util.LinkedList<Sound> getSounds()
        Converts MusicStructure to a linked list of Sound objects
        Returns:
        the linked list of sounds that compose the structure

      • popSound

        public Sound popSound()
        Removes the first sound of the music structure, which is the return object of this method
        Returns:
        the first sound of the structure

      • getFirstSound

        public Sound getFirstSound()
        Returns the first sound of the music structure, without removing it
        Returns:
        the first sound of the structure

      • getLastSound

        public Sound getLastSound()
        Returns the last sound of the music structure, without removing it
        Returns:
        the last sound of the structure

      • clearSounds

        public void clearSounds()
        Erases all the sounds of the music structure, leaving it empty implies exists() = false

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Converts the music structure to a string that is reading-friendly
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a reading-friendly string
